text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

translation.en: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him
translation.id: Ataukah mereka mempunyai tuhan selain Allah? Mahasuci Allah dari apa yang mereka persekutukan
